title: Unspecified Error Occurred. Please check the logs for more information
body: Hey guys, i am mac user and i just need a  little help on what's going with lol. Since 10/1/2015, i have been getting disconnections from games and a error report comes up telling me that lol client has a bug . now whenever i try to turn on lol i have the message of "Unspecified Error Occurred. Please check the logs for more information" and it just wouldn't load into the login screen. I'm using a Mac and i have been trying to find a solution to this online and i realised that i can't even go into the support page of lol oce and to re-download the game.  I've tried this at home with a window computer and it also appeared to be same issue. The weirdest thing is that when i go to a friend's house with these two laptops, everything seems normal and running. What would causes these problem and how to solve ? is it the internet provider (TPG) blocked my internet gaming or is Riot banned my IP?

replies.body: Although i use Mac but the instruction helped. Thank you very much. It works as usual now.
This problem is the same for me. I need a fix please!
